exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: A variation of the bench press that emphasizes the upper chest.

exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that works the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Chest Fly
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the chest muscles.

exercises.name: Cable Crossover
exercises.description: A cable exercise that targets the chest from different angles.

exercises.name: Pull-Ups
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the upper back and biceps.

exercises.name: Bent Over Row
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.description: A cable exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi muscles.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: A compound exercise that works the entire posterior chain.

exercises.name: Seated Row
exercises.description: A cable exercise that targets the middle back and biceps.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: A machine exercise that targets the quadriceps and glutes.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: A bodyweight or weighted exercise that targets the legs and glutes.

exercises.name: Leg Curl
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the hamstrings.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the calf muscles.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the shoulders and triceps.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the lateral deltoids.

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the front deltoids.

exercises.name: Shrugs
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the trapezius muscles.

exercises.name: Upright Row
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the shoulders and traps.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the triceps.

exercises.name: Sk ull Crushers

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
